bill.title: Requires absentee ballots for fire district elections, including, but not limited to, all projects or mandatory, permissive or special referendums which require a vote by qualified residents of such fire district; provides that a qualified voter may vote as an absentee voter under certain circumstances and lays out such criteria; requires that an application must be received by the district clerk no earlier than the thirtieth day before the election for which an absentee ballot is sought; makes related provisions.
bill.description: Requires absentee ballots for fire district elections, including, but not limited to, all projects or mandatory, permissive or special referendums which require a vote by qualified residents of such fire district; provides that a qualified voter may vote as an absentee voter under certain circumstances and lays out such criteria; requires that an application must be received by the district clerk no earlier than the thirtieth day before the election for which an absentee ballot is sought; makes related provisions.
